post.body: can't recall the scene but it's likely. Some spinners are very serious about it. I <3 the guy who rides his bike to spin class.
the room is dark, poor lighting. But the site of 70 people doing jumps would be a good video. @lgood44 Richard Simmons?
Got mine for about $80. Gadgets can get costly, can't they?
I asked a woman on a bike near me with ones and she suggested a local shop. Got a discount for mentioning the recommendation.
I hope you like it! Towel is optional but water is a must :)
You know when the instructor says "pull up as hard as you're pushing down"? With the shoes, you can. You really feel it.
Bob and Besty - I love it! Do you have spin shoes? I couldn't believe how much a difference they make!
I expect you to become a co-contributer!!
the movie is a study in context clues. Check out background in Fox's house - says more about their relationship than they do.
we saw The Spirit and stayed til the end because darn it, we were not going to be bested by a movie!
I'll gladly show her off at any time :)
NYC and London only, alas.
I'd be right there with you. Have you ever been to a Chop't? Lots of choices and they hand chop the salads.
@angelastockman you don't see burning eyeballs on the screen. It's alluded to and you see the consequences years later.
I was totally prepared to be around small children today, too!
I always thought itunes were just for iPods. My PC learned me tonight that it ain't so!
Looking for to spin class tomorrow - see you bright and early @angelastockman and @elizabethfisher (congrats on NSDC, BTW!)
I am seriously considering walking out of a movie for the first time in my life
We finished back seasons of BSG last night. We've got a cool theory on the 12th cylon. If we're right, the writers are fracking brilliant.
We're heading to see The Spirit. The coup de grace for our vacation.
